I eat babies. 

 
 After learning of this quote, I am staunchly against Tom's eating of babies.
 
 On an unrelated note, the quote system on this forum is a wonderful idea that is both completly reliable and incapable of being abused.
The quote system us fairly hard to abuse. You are still expected to back your quote up with a source and/or quote another poster (and in which case the original post is readily availiable).

Is the quote real?
 On second thought, should I be surprised by anything that he says or does?
 Are you sure he's refuring to human babies as appose to animal babies?
 In case of animal babies: Eggs are baby chickens, I believe Viel (or how ever it's spelled) is from a baby cow (along with some forms of cow's liver that's served) which I'm opposed to eating liver, but that's another story.
 If he is refering to human babies, then, well, I am sooooo against it. How dare he? He should have a baby byte him. Let's go and ban all of his movies regardless of who else is in them! emoticon_rolleyes 
 Honestly, I don't think he truely said that. And if he did say that, I don't think it was serious or meant how it sounds in the quote. Wait, did he say it while jumping up and down on a couch and getting hysterical?
